name: plunger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a suction device consisting of a cup-shaped piece of rubber on the end of a stick, used to get rid of things that are blocking pipes
DonNichols/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a part of a device that you push down into it: He pressed down the plunger of his cafetière.
Jenny Dettrick/Moment/GettyImages

a device consisting of a cup-shaped piece of rubber on the end of a stick, used to remove substances blocking a pipe, esp. in a kitchen or bathroom
